alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:21AM CDT until June 05 at 5:17AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying farmland and other rural land floods. At 30.0 feet, Highway 152 floods 0.75 miles west of La Cygne. If Middle Creek is also flooding Highway 152, the only route into or out of La Cygne will be the County Road, or 4th Street, leading north from La Cygne. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:01 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 27.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River La Cygne 25.0 27.8 Wed 8am 29.0 31.2 28.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
